meanings.definition: Anodizers: People or companies that perform the process of anodizing.
meanings.sent1: The anodizers at the factory work hard to coat metal with a protective layer.
meanings.sent2: We hired professional anodizers to treat our aluminum parts.
meanings.sent3: The anodizers threw a party to celebrate their successful anodizing projects.
meanings.sent4: The anodizers are like artists, transforming plain metal into colorful masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the skilled anodizers who made our products shine.

meanings.definition: Anodizers: The act of anodizing, specifically referring to those who carry out the process.
meanings.sent1: Watching the anodizers work was fascinating as they dipped metal into the solution.
meanings.sent2: The anodizers completed the job efficiently and with precision.
meanings.sent3: The anodizers decided to anodize a giant statue just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The anodizers' hands moved like lightning, transforming metal before our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The anodizers' workshop hummed with the sound of metal being anodized.

meanings.definition: Anodizers: The products or materials that have been treated with anodizing.
meanings.sent1: The anodizers' finished products gleamed under the bright lights.
meanings.sent2: We received a shipment of anodizers for our construction project.
meanings.sent3: The anodizers on the shelves seemed to glow with a magical aura.
meanings.sent4: The anodizers stood out among the other metal components with their unique colors.
meanings.sent5: The anodizers added a touch of elegance to the otherwise plain machinery.
